title: Beastly
desc:
This is loosely based on the 2007 novel of the same name by Alex Flinn.

The novel is a modern adaptation of the 18th-century French fairy tale Beauty and the Beast by Jeanne-Marie Leprince de Beaumont, itself adapted from a fairy tale written by French novelist Gabrielle-Suzanne Barbot de Villeneuve.
